criteria: Completing the Square: Demonstrates the ability to correctly apply the method of completing the square to transform a quadratic equation into the form (x - p)^2 = q.
Deriving the Quadratic Formula: Demonstrates the ability to derive the quadratic formula by completing the square on the general quadratic equation ax^2 + bx + c = 0.
Solving Quadratic Equations: Demonstrates the ability to find the solutions (roots) of quadratic equations using both completing the square and the quadratic formula.
descriptions: Unable to start the process of completing the square.
Attempts to complete the square but makes significant errors in algebraic manipulation or understanding of the process.
Completes the square with some errors in algebraic manipulation, leading to an incorrect transformed equation.
Completes the square correctly for simpler quadratic equations but struggles with more complex coefficients or equations.
Completes the square accurately for a variety of quadratic equations, demonstrating a strong understanding of the method.
Completes the square flawlessly and can explain the reasoning behind each step in the process.
Unable to start the derivation of the quadratic formula.
Attempts to derive the quadratic formula but struggles with the algebraic manipulation and makes significant errors.
Derives part of the quadratic formula but cannot complete the derivation or makes critical errors in the process.
Derives the quadratic formula with some errors in algebraic manipulation or simplification.
Successfully derives the quadratic formula with only minor errors.
Derives the quadratic formula accurately and efficiently, demonstrating a clear understanding of the derivation process.
Unable to solve quadratic equations using completing the square or the quadratic formula.
Attempts to solve quadratic equations but makes significant errors in applying the methods or in algebraic manipulation.
Solves simpler quadratic equations but struggles with more complex equations or makes errors in the solution process.
Solves quadratic equations with some errors in algebraic manipulation or simplification, leading to incorrect solutions.
Solves a variety of quadratic equations accurately using completing the square and the quadratic formula.
Solves quadratic equations accurately and efficiently, and can verify the solutions obtained.
